newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Vendex to price Vedior shares DFl 33-37.
newsitem.headline: Vendex to price Vedior shares DFl 33-37.

text.p: Retail and business services group Vendex International NV said on Wednesday it would price shares in its floatation of its employment services unit Vedior at between 33 and 37 guilders each.
The final price will be announced as soon as possible after closing of the subscription period, Vendex said.

16,713,810 certificates of ordinary shares in Vedior N.V. will be offered, and the banking syndicate has the option for an additional issue of 2,507,000 certificates only in order to cover any possible over-allocation, Vendex said.
"Based on the price range, the total bourse value of the Vedior services group amounts to in between 3.1 and 3.5 billion guilders," Vendex said in a statement.
The provisional prospectus will be available on May 25, the allocation and first day of listing are planned for June 5.

Morgan Stanley & Co International Limited will act as global-coordinator and lead manager for the Vedior listing, and the syndicate further comprises ING Barings, ABN Amro Rothschild and Paribas Capital Markets, Vendex said.
ING Barings also acts as a listing agent, while Banque Nationale de Paris, BZW, Merrill Lynch, Rabobank Securities and UBS are co-managers.
On May 12, Vendex confirmed its plans to list the unit separately in London and Amsterdam in June, placing between 600 and 650 million guilders worth of ordinary shares in Vedior.
